md:
giải nghĩa từ "italicized" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Italicized** (adjective)

* Meaning: Written or printed in italics, especially to indicate emphasis or distinction.
* Vietnamese: In nghiêng (written or printed in italics)

Example sentence: The **italicized** words in the sentence are the ones that need to be emphasized.

Related words: bold, underline, highlight

Antonyms: plain, normal, regular

Note: In typography, italics are a style of font that slants to the right, used to add emphasis or distinction to text.

Italicized (adjective)

  • Meaning: Written or printed in italics, especially to indicate emphasis or distinction.
  • Vietnamese: In nghiêng (written or printed in italics)

Example sentence: The italicized words in the sentence are the ones that need to be emphasized.

Related words: bold, underline, highlight

Antonyms: plain, normal, regular

Note: In typography, italics are a style of font that slants to the right, used to add emphasis or distinction to text.
